public static void profile_save(video editvid, string name) { string pf = appdir + "\profiles.ini", tf = appdir + "\profiles.tmp", data, profile = ""; StreamWriter pWrite = File.CreateText(tf); if (File.Exists(pf)) { StreamReader pRead = File.OpenText(pf); while (pRead.Peek() > -1) { data = pRead.ReadLine(); if (data.Length > 8) if (data.Substring(0, 8) == "Profile=") { profile = data.Substring(8, data.Length - 8); } if (profile != name && data != "") pWrite.WriteLine(data); if (data.Length >= 3) if (data.Substring(0, 3) == "END") { profile = ""; pWrite.WriteLine(); } } while (pRead.Peek() > -1) { data = pRead.ReadLine(); if (data.Length > 8) if (data.Substring(0, 8) == "Profile=") { profile = data.Substring(8, data.Length - 8); } if (profile != name && data != "") pWrite.WriteLine(data); if (data.Length >= 3) if (data.Substring(0, 3) == "END") { profile = ""; pWrite.WriteLine(); } } pRead.Close(); File.Delete(pf); } pWrite.WriteLine( "Profile=" + name + "
" + "Version= " + MainForm.intversion + "
" + (editvid.MKV ? "MP4= " + !editvid.MKV + "
" "iPod= " + editvid.iPod + "
" "Recompressed= " + editvid.remuxaudio + "
" "Passes= " + editvid.passes + "
" "CQ= " + editvid.CQ + "
" "Quant= " + editvid.quality + "
" "AutoSize= " + !editvid.CustomSize + "
" "Aspect= " + editvid.UseAspect + "
" "Ratio= " + editvid.aspectRatio + "
" "CustomX= " + editvid.customX + "
" "CustomY= " + editvid.customY + "
" "MaxSize= " + editvid.MaxSize + "
" "MaxX= " + editvid.maxX + "
" "MaxY= " + editvid.maxY + "
" "AutoCrop= " + editvid.autocrop + "
" "CustomCrop= " + editvid.CustomCrop + "
" "CropL= " + editvid.cropL + "
" "CropT= " + editvid.cropT + "
" "CropR= " + editvid.cropR + "
" "CropB= " + editvid.cropB + "
" "Deinterlace= " + editvid.Deinterlace + "
" "Double= " + editvid.DoubleFPS + "
" "FieldOrder= " + editvid.fieldorder + "
" "AutoBitrate= " + !editvid.CustomBitrate + "
" "CustomABitrate=" + editvid.CustomABitrate + "
" "ABitrate= " + editvid.aBitrate + "
" "VBitrate= " + editvid.vBitrate + "
" "Downmix= " + editvid.Downmix + "
" "EnforceProfile=" + editvid.EnforceProfile + "
" "X264Profile= " + editvid.x264profile + "
" "Level= " + editvid.x264level + "
" "UseMaxRate= " + editvid.usemaxrate + "
" "MaxRate= " + editvid.maxBitrate + "
" "TargetSize= " + editvid.usetargetsize + "
" "ChangeFPS= " + editvid.changefps + "
" "FPS= " + editvid.customFPS + "
" "FileSize= " + editvid.filesize + "
" "Bytes= " + editvid.filesizebytes + "
" "Deblocking= " + editvid.deblocking + "
" "Strength= " + editvid.strength + "
" "Thresh= " + editvid.thresh + "
" "Buffer= " + editvid.buffer + "
" "IBuffer= " + editvid.ibuffer + "
" "Variance= " + editvid.variance + "
" "QC= " + editvid.QC + "
" "Blur= " + editvid.blur + "
" "BlurQ= " + editvid.blurq + "
